body.name: Hamilton Beach Sure Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo & Electric Indoor Grill, 450 F Searing Temp, Bake, Broil, Toast and Pizza Functions, 88 cu. ft., 6 Slice Capacity, Stainless Steel (31395)

features: MULTIFUNCTIONAL VERSATILITY WITH 1700 WATTS: Replace your air fryer, indoor grill and other kitchen appliances with this air fryer oven with 6 digital cooking modes: air fry, grill, bake, broil, toast and pizza. It has a timer with Stay On function.

HIGH SEARING TEMPERATURE FOR OUTDOOR GRILLED FLAVORS: The nonstick, ribbed grill plate achieves 450°F searing temperature so you can enjoy the look and taste of your favorite grilled foods year-round. Grills six 4 oz. hamburgers in under 10 minutes.*

SURE-CRISP AIR FRY MODE FOR CRISP RESULTS: With air fry convection, heated air circulates around all sides of food for tender, even cooking inside and extra golden crisping outside. Little to no oil required.

LARGE CAPACITY PROVIDES PLENTY OF COOKING SPACE: The air fryer convection oven's large 0.88 cu. ft. capacity is the perfect size for making family meals. Cook up to a 8 pound turkey, bake a 12" diameter pizza, grill 6 burgers, bake desserts and more.

DURABLE GRILL PLATE DESIGNED FOR EASY GRILLING AND FAST CLEANUP: The grill plate has a built-in handle for easily sliding in and out of the oven, and pour spouts that make it simple to discard drippings. The grill plate is nonstick and dishwasher safe.
*Using 80/20 ground beef to achieve 165°F internal temperature.
body.description: The Hamilton Beach® Sure-Crisp® Air Fry & Grilling Oven has 1700 watts and 6 digital cooking modes: air fry, grill, bake, broil, toast and pizza. With high searing temperature and a nonstick grill plate, you'll enjoy outdoor grill flavors year-round.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy outdoor grilled flavors any time with 450°F searing temperature The oven can grill six 4 oz. hamburgers in under 10 minutes.* The included nonstick grill plate achieves 450°F searing temperature so you can enjoy the taste of your favorite grilled foods like steaks and burgers using the grill mode.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights and in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Grilling Oven With 1700 watts and 6 digital cooking modes, the Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp Air Fry & Grilling Oven can replace your standalone air fryer and other small kitchen appliances. It even lets you enjoy grilled foods indoors all year long. Cooking modes include air fry, grill, bake, broil, toast and pizza, and the oven also has a timer with Stay On function and ready bell. You'll also love how easy the oven air fries onion rings, French fries, chicken nuggets and other foods that you'd typically fry in oil. The Sure-Crisp air fry mode circulates air around food for tender, even cooking inside and extra golden crisping outside, with little to no oil required. Durable ceramic, nonstick grill plate is designed for no-hassle grilling and is easy to clean Multifunctional versatility with 1700 watts and 6 digital cooking modes: air fry, grill, bake, broil, toast and pizza Large 0.88 cu. ft. capacity fits up to a whole 8 pound turkey, 12" pizza or 6 hamburgers Includes dishwasher safe nonstick grill plate, an air fry basket, oven rack, bake pan and slide-out crumb tray

Multifunctional Versatility with 1700 Watts & 6 Digital Cooking Modes Modes Replace your standalone air fryer and multiple kitchen appliances with this one versatile air fryer oven. It has 6 digital cooking modes: air fry, grill, bake, broil, toast and pizza. It also has a timer with Stay On function and ready bell. High Searing Temperature for Outdoor Grilled Flavors Anytime The nonstick, ribbed grill plate achieves 450°F searing temperature so you can enjoy the look and taste of your favorite grilled foods year-round. Grills six 4 oz. hamburgers in under 10 minutes.* Sure-Crisp Air Fry Mode for Crisp Results Heated air circulates around all sides of food for tender, even cooking inside and extra golden crisping outside. Little to no oil required.

Large Capacity Provides Plenty of Cooking Space This toaster oven has a large 0.88 cu. ft. capacity — the perfect size for making family meals. Cook up to a whole 8 pound turkey, bake a 12" diameter pizza, grill 6 burgers, bake desserts and more. Durable Grill Plate Designed for Easy Grilling & Fast Cleanup The grill plate is designed to make grilling easy and convenient. It has a built-in handle for easily sliding it in and out of the oven, and pour spouts make it simple to pour and discard drippings. The grill plate is nonstick and dishwasher safe for fast cleanup. Premium Accessories Included The oven comes with all the accessories you need to air fry, grill, bake, broil and toast. These include the dishwasher safe nonstick grill plate, an air fry basket, oven rack, bake pan and slide-out crumb tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a Breville Smart Oven. Since this one was a lot cheaper than the Breville ($111 vs $278), I was a bit skeptical on how this would work. It is about the same size as my Breville, it has more functions, and it works flawlessly. I am very happy with it. It seems sturdy and well made. It is easy to operate and very roomy inside. I highly recommend this toaster oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars versatile and well made
reviews.reviewText: This is a versatile product from hamilton beach. Hamilton beach is a name brand company, so you can generally trust their products. As well as know that they will have good customer service, that will be around for years to come. The item is ready to use out of the box, and comes with different racks to help with specific tasks. There are different rack positions as well. I like the convection function to "air fry". In general it does a good job for most things, including indoor "grilling" (of sorts). The dials and buttons are easy to read and use, and the digital screen is a great way to have a visual of everything, including some functions. It is priced fairly for the quality and versatility. It is a good, well made product, from a reputable company, so 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this toaster oven combo! I love the different modes on it, but even more so, I LOVE the different arrows on the front that show where to put the rack for each type of cooking/baking you plan to do in it. We are a family of 8 and our oven has been broken for the better part of a year, so I've been exclusively baking in the toaster oven and I honestly don't know if I want to go back to a regular gas oven. I've made everything from cookies and cakes, to sourdough bread and pizza in this thing and it works so well! Very impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ari Frying Toaster
reviews.reviewText: We held out on the air fryer craze. Finally bought this and we probably have used it every single day since. I’d say it’s one of the best purchases I’ve made for our kitchen. Don’t know why we held out so long. Throw out the other appliances (kidding. But am I?) and make room for this air frying bad boy! Quick and efficient. Seems well built and easy to use. Nice display and tactile controls. Came with good accessories. It’s an air fryer and a toaster. We’ve used it for toast, chicken, left overs, cookies, kid food etc. Be aware that cooking time varies based on what tray you select. The wire rack cooks a lot faster than the trays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but not amazing
reviews.reviewText: This Hamilton Beach Sure Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo is the company's entrant in the low-cost air fryer/toaster oven combo landscape.Like others on the market, Hamilton Beach has created this device with basically no insulation. The outside gets HOT, so be careful to only grab the handle on the door and nothing else.The entire appliance is very lightweight and made of thin stainless steel. It includes inserts for air frying, grilling, and roasting/toasting, and they're all fine, but fairly flimsy.The device works okay, but not great at its main jobs of air frying and toasting. Pre-heating before baking or air frying is essential. The air fryer takes sometimes much longer than you think it should based on instructions on the box of whatever you're cooking.Some of the frozen mozzarella sticks I've cooked often begin to leak cheese while others in the same basket aren't quite cooked through. Bagels and bread toast well, but I'd like a way to reduce the heat coming from either the top or bottom to keep the outside of the bagel less hot.During thanksgiving, I cooked a 10x6 Pyrex dish of sweet potatoes in this oven, and found it came out quite well, despite taking about 1.5 hours to bake.The controls are complicated, but not too bad once you're figured them out. I like that they're all digital on the screen, and the knobs are easy to understand once you get the hang of them. The instruction manual does a good job of telling you how to use the device.All in all, I'd say this is a decent appliance, but I wish it air fried better than it does. I would give it 4 stars if I could reliably make crispy, gooey mozzarella sticks without some getting overcooked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works super well
reviews.reviewText: A very nice oven that works super well. It is a bit on the lighter side which caught me by surprise but it works super well. It is small but spacious as well. It comes with all different types of cooking options and really diverse. Since it comes, with different I would recommend looking at the manual to see what it offers, to really make it worth the buy. Really happy with it.
